full_summary:
### 2024 Tender Announcement for Refrigeration and A/C Mechanic/Tinsmith Metal Sheet Workers Services

**Notice Reference:** cb-565-44692467
**Notice Title:** Services de frigoriste/ferblantier compagnons et apprentis

**Introduction:**
Correctional Service Canada is seeking a contractor to provide refrigeration and A/C mechanic/tinsmith metal sheet workers services, including apprentices, to support its correctional institutions in the Quebec region.

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'offre à commandes)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Trade Agreement:**
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
    * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))
    * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama)
    * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras)
    * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie)
    * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou)
    * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili)

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will be required to provide refrigeration and A/C mechanic/tinsmith metal sheet workers services, including:
- Perform maintenance, replacement, modification, inspection, and repairs of existing components and installation of new components to mechanical refrigeration systems.
- Install and repair the mechanical refrigeration units of ventilation, air treatment, and air-conditioning systems.
- Perform diagnostics to identify the cause of failures.

**Timeline and Duration:**
The contract will be awarded on a standing offer basis, with a term of two years, followed by up to two additional one-year periods.

**Contact Information:**
To obtain more information or to submit a bid, contact:
Kim Lavallée
Correctional Service Canada
250 Montée St-François, Laval, QC H7C 1S5
Phone: (514) 235-9156
Email: kim.lavallée@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Bidding Documents:**
Tendering documents, including the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria, are available for download from the Canada Buys/Tender
